member.summary: Updates the size of an FrameworkElement.

The height that a parent element can allocate a child element.

member.summary: Gets the current rendered Size of this FrameworkElement.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Maui.Handlers.EntryHandler.HandleClearButtonTouched(Android.Views.MotionEvent)
member.summary: Checks whether the touched position on the EditText is inbounds with clear button and clears if so. This will return True to handle OnTouch to prevent re-activating keyboard after clearing the text.
member.returns: True if clear button is clicked and Text is cleared. False if not.
